instruction: Describe a current event you have read about or heard in the news in the input.
input: The discovery of an exoplanet orbiting two suns
output: Astronomers recently discovered an exoplanet, named K2-288B, orbiting two suns about 226 light years away from Earth. This is the first exoplanet system around two stars to be discovered within the habitable zone, making it potentially capable of supporting life.
